org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.security
Class SecurityPlugin

java.lang.Object
  org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.base.DmpServletPlugin
      org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.security.SecurityPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
SecurityManagerIF
public class SecurityPlugin
extends DmpServletPlugin
implements SecurityManagerIF

This is an example implementation of a plugin that implements the role of SecurityManager. When initialized, it creates the UserFolderRI and a single UserRI as follows: UserFolderRI dotName uf UserRI dotName uf.1 userName example password example

login

public LoginResponse login(LoginRequest request)
Description copied from interface: SecurityManagerIF
This method should be overloaded to perform whatever authentication is required to determine that a user is allowed to connect.

logout

public LogoutResponse logout(LogoutRequest request)
Description copied from interface: SecurityManagerIF
Terminates the associated session with the server. Any subsequent transactions that use the related session identifier will be rejected.

Specified by:
logout in interface SecurityManagerIF
Returns:
a logout response.

validateSession

public Response validateSession(Request request)
                         throws DmcValueException
Description copied from interface: SecurityManagerIF
This method should be overloaded to perform validation of the session identifier associated with the request as well as any additional security checks required. For example, if security groups have been implemented and the associated user doesn't have sufficient privileges to perform an operation, the request should be denied.

Specified by:
validateSession in interface SecurityManagerIF
Parameters:
request - the request to be checked.
Returns:
An error response if any problems are found and null if everything is okay.
Throws:
DmcValueException

Parameters:
request - The request for which we require the session handle.
Returns:
the session object associated with a request.
